title: ALCS: Astros Rolling Even as Jose Altuve Struggles
description: Jose Altuve’s double in Game 3 was his first hit of the postseason, and Yordan Alvarez and Kyle Tucker were also struggling against the Yankees. Regardless, Houston led the series, 3-0.
dc:creator: Gary Phillips
media:description: Houston’s Jose Altuve was on a hot streak at the end of the regular season, but he is 1 for 28 since the postseason began.
